query: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND (TABLE_NAME LIKE '%noti%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%announce%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%notice%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%post%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%news%');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND (TABLE_NAME LIKE '%noti%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%announce%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%notice%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%post%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%news%');
stdout:
TABLE_NAME
postLikes
posts
postImages
postViews
notifications
announcements
